sources.title: SOS Coast Guard (1937) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGERüçï BELA LUGOSI
sources.description:
12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Ralph Byrd, Bela Lugosi, Maxine Doyle
Directors: Alan James, William Witney
Notorious arms dealer Boroff (Bela Lugosi) is on a deadly mission to supply the rogue nation of Morovania with a powerful disintegrating gas. But Coast Guard Lieutenant Terry Kent (Ralph Byrd) is hot on his trail, determined to stop the villain before his weapon unleashes chaos.
 üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:07     CHAPTER 1:  Disaster at Sea
31:12     CHAPTER 2:  Barrage of Death
51:00     CHAPTER 3:  The Gas Chamber
1:09:45  CHAPTER 4:  The Fatal Shaft
1:29:23  CHAPTER 5:  The Mystery Ship
1:47:57  CHAPTER 6:  Deadly Cargo
2:06:04  CHAPTER 7:  Undersea Terror
2:21:52  CHAPTER 8:  The Crash!
2:38:28  CHAPTER 9:  Wolves at Bay
2:54:23  CHAPTER 10: The Acid Trail
3:11:25  CHAPTER 11: The Sea Battle
3:28:40 CHAPTER 12: The Deadly Circle
3:45:42  Please Subscribe!

Get ready for a thrilling 12-chapter serial marathon packed with vintage action, suspense, and edge-of-your-seat cliffhangers! Also starring Maxine Doyle and directed by serial veterans Alan James and William Witney, this rare gem from Republic Pictures delivers non-stop excitement and classic cinema charm.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Perfect for fans of Golden Age cliffhanger serials, black-and-white action thrillers, and vintage Republic Pictures productions, this complete serial is ideal for viewers who love classic movie heroes, mad villains, and pulse-pounding storytelling. Whether you‚Äôre a lifelong Bela Lugosi fan, a Ralph Byrd enthusiast, or a nostalgic serial binge-watcher, this fully restored presentation is a must-watch. Rediscover one of the greatest chapter plays of the 1930s and experience old-school Hollywood thrills like never before.

Be sure to like, comment, and subscribe for more classic serials, vintage movie marathons, and rare cinematic treasures‚Äîonly on PizzaFLIX and beyond!

metadata.Plot: A 12-episode serial. The government of Marovania hires the wicked Boroff to manufacture a powerful gas that causes mass disintegration. Boroff is en route to Marovania with a boatload of arnatite to make the gas when his steamer runs aground off the California coast. Boroff soon commits a murder. The Coast Guard, led by Lt. Terry Kent, must hunt Boroff, figure out his plan and where the arnatite is, capture and dispose of any gas Boroff manages to make, and protect the safety of civilians, including Terry's special friend, ubiquitous reporter Jean Norman, and her chatty photographer, Snapper McGee. Aiding Boroff is his slave Thorg, a formidable giant. Kent must often use his fists.
metadata.Writer: Barry Shipman, Franklin Adreon, Morgan Cox
metadata.Actors: Ralph Byrd, Bela Lugosi, Maxine Doyle
